resources.string: Img2Png is a tool to extract and convert samsung image resources to png format for easy theming. It relies on the built-in TouchWiz Rom image loader to read the samsung image resources and save them as png images
Some formats need a device that support new samsung image resources with android 5.1+ or higher
QMG, ASTC, WEBP, PIO, WBP, OPTIPNG, QUANTPNG, PKM, ATC, PNG_OPTI, PNG_QUANT, QIO
